original_text: On the cross, Christ took away the power of the bad spirits that have authority to rule people. He showed clearly that he himself has won against them. Now everyone can see that those bad spirits have no power.
korean_text: 통치자들과 권세들을 무력화하여 드러내어 구경거리로 삼으시고 십자가로 그들을 이기셨느니라

sentences.original_text: On the cross, Christ took away the power
that have authority to rule people
that he himself has won against them

sentences.korean_translation: 이제 모든 사람이 볼 수 있다

sentences.original_text: that those bad spirits have no power
sentences.korean_translation: 그 악한 영들이 권세가 없다는 것을
